message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  While I appreciate the value you're highlighting,  $15,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for this product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $15,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13,500. It's a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think you'll really appreciate it.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $13,500, but I'm still not quite there. I'm sticking with my offer of $12,000. This is my final offer, and I'm ready to move forward if you're willing to accept.
